[My]0-i hands went on either side of [her]97-heidi face , boxing [her]97-heidi in . [She]97-heidi swallowed , but met [my]0-i gaze fiercely . [I]0-i thought [she]97-heidi ’d push [me]0-i away . [I]0-i thought [she]97-heidi ’d stop [me]0-i . “ Do [you]97-heidi still feel the way [you]97-heidi felt back when [we]3257-we were talking ? ”[97-heidi] “ [Landon]103-landon , ”[97-heidi] [she]97-heidi whispered . [Her]97-heidi words came out breathy and soft . “ Do n’t do this . ”[97-heidi] “ Do [you]97-heidi ? ”[97-heidi] “ [I]97-heidi have n’t spoken to [you]97-heidi in months . [I]97-heidi ca n’t answer [you]97-heidi . ”[97-heidi] “ [She]190-emery ’s dating [[my]97-heidi brother]338-my brother . [I]97-heidi do n’t think that applies anymore , [Heidi]97-heidi . Just answer [me]97-heidi this : do [you]97-heidi or do [you]97-heidi not still care for [me]97-heidi ? ”[97-heidi] [She]97-heidi paused , frozen in place with [her]97-heidi ice blue eyes boring into [mine]2153-mine . [She]97-heidi was trying to find where this was a trick or a joke . But [she]97-heidi would n’t find it with [me]0-i . “ Yes , ”[97-heidi] [she]97-heidi whispered .
